reviews.review: 当初csgo免费，朋友们说这游戏不要钱，现在全家都以为我在吸毒

Are you looking for a game that can get your blood pumping and heart racing? Well look no further for I have the game for you, behold the most raging game in existence, you could shoot a guy 4-5 times with an ak and he would still not die *crowd: oooo*. It also has such a loving community *some russian screaming in the background*. Thats not all people, gamers play this game with honor and respect *the host gets head shot through 10 walls, 5 security guards, while he was looking backwards*. So come on down to COUNTER-STRIKE: GLOBAL OFFENSIVE!!! where all hell will break loss and you might go insane but in the end it is worth it XD
very fun, and takes up lots of time
A lot of  bad people but is very fun to play with friends. Starting out is rough and always has a large sum of hackers

Just the strangest experience ever, got people yelling in Russian, somebody trying to teach a math class, somebody pretending to beat their meat, and somebody actually beating their meat, and sometimes you get to shoot people.
好游戏，目前段位低还碰不到外挂，不过我感觉我要控制及不住自己的手了
Amazing Game amazing community, I would Highly recommend this game!

Olhando por um lado, o jogo é incrivelmente ruim, e pelo outro, o jogo é incrivelmente ruim, ou seja, o jogo é ruim em seu todo.
Não vale nem um pouco a pena gastar seu tempo jogando esse pedaço de lixo totalmente bugado, porém, eu gastei mais de mil horas nisso pois gosto de sofrer.

A positive interactive game that is suitable for the family! I have spent countless hours of sweat and tears, breaking my hand and my keyboard. If you're looking to spend multiple hours yelling at your computer screen as you spend your hard earned cash at pixels. This game is for you!

CS:GO is a game that doesn't forgive you messing up. You jump and shoot, your aim is absolutely gone. Run face-first into a gunfight, death awaits swiftly. 

Learn the game. Get better. Learn some Russian. Memorize fire patterns, move speeds, reload times...

Basically...




git gud.
